axrevolutionai: Part of social media is the reactions of others. If Donald Trump and Hillary Clinton can handle millions of people judging them and their entire identity, past lives, choiced, appearances, etc A blogger who only reaches a few thousands at a time should be able to do it herself. Instead, you'll pay money to have your comments curated before they even reach you. There's no point to social media without accepting the reality of the people viewing you and generating your revenue, whether that reality is positive or negative.
